title: Nano Gel Pad Car Sticky Pad - 10 Pack Reusable Super Sticky Gripping Pads - Super Gripping Sticky Pads for Car Dashboard - 2 Sizes Magic Sticky Pads Clear Holds Objects Under 5 Lbs
features: LOOKING FOR A WAY TO MOUNT AND HOLD ANYTHING IN PLACE WITHOUT USING GLUE OR NAILS? Our reusable super sticky gripping pads are perfect for the job! Just stick the nano gel pad onto any smooth surface and you're good to go. Plus, they leave no residue behind so you can move them around as needed. Always keep your Smartphone handy by sticking it to your dash when needed with this car sticky pad.

EASY TO CLEAN. REUSABLE UP TO 1,000 TIMES. These anti slip super gripping sticky pads for car dashboard are intended for use on firm, smooth non-porous surfaces. Avoid use on rough, oily or textured surfaces such as brick, textiles and other irregular surfaces. Do not use on freshly painted walls or irreplaceable items. Our super sticky gripping pad works best on metal, plastic, smooth wood, glass, mirrors and untextured drywall, smooth surfaces. Remove dirt and debris by washing in warm water.

STICKS ON WINDOWS, BATHROOM MIRRORS, REFRIGERATORS CUTS DOWN TO ANY DESIRED SIZE. These magic sticky pads clear make a great gift to give to anyone. Perfect for use on window glass to hang ornaments and decorations during Christmas, holidays and other special occasions. Hang tooth brushes on bathroom mirrors with this sticky gel pad.

10 PIECE MULTI PACK SET FOR ALL YOUR NEEDS. The silicone sticky gel pads leave no glue or residue behind when removed from any surface. They are reusable, repositionable and washable. Set of 10 sticky gel gripping pads include 5 pads sized 3" W x 2.5" H and 5 pads sized 1.5" W x 1.25" H giving you options to stick multiple objects in various places like auto dashboards and much more.

QUICKLY MOUNT AND HOLD ANY OBJECT UP TO 5 LBS ANYWHERE. Quickly mount cell phones, smartphones, razors, keys, sunglasses holders, brushes, tools, cables, and more in seconds with the quickstick gel pads, sticking grip mats. Ten double-sided nonslip stick pads attach to most flat surfaces for easy mounting of items under 5 pounds. Use in cars, autos, boats, RV's, trucks, and more.
